scripts.start: npm run postinstall.web && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng serve web-giddh
scripts.build: npm run postinstall.web && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build web-giddh --configuration=local
scripts.build-prod: npm run postinstall.web && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build web-giddh --configuration=prod --output-hashing=all && node tools/web/postbuild --path=dist/apps/web-giddh && npm run rm_bak_files
scripts.build-stage: npm run postinstall.web && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build web-giddh --configuration=stage --output-hashing=all && node tools/web/postbuild --path=dist/apps/web-giddh && npm run rm_bak_files
scripts.build-test: npm run postinstall.web && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build web-giddh --configuration=test --output-hashing=all && node tools/web/postbuild --path=dist/apps/web-giddh && npm run rm_bak_files
scripts.build-dev: npm run postinstall.web && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build web-giddh --configuration=local --output-hashing=all && node tools/web/postbuild --path=dist/apps/web-giddh && npm run rm_bak_files
scripts.clean.shared: cd libs/ && git clean -dfX && cd ../xplat/ && git clean -dfX
scripts.clean: npx rimraf hooks node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.start.web.giddh: npm run postinstall.web && ng serve web-giddh
scripts.build.electron.giddh.test: npm run prepare.electron.giddh && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build electron-giddh --configuration=test
scripts.build.electron.giddh: npm run prepare.electron.giddh && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build electron-giddh --configuration=prod
scripts.build.electron.giddh.linux: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --linux
scripts.build.electron.giddh.windows: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --windows
scripts.build.electron.giddh.mac: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --mac
scripts.release: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && cross-env AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=key_id  AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=access_key npx electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder.json -mwl --x64 --publish always
scripts.package: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx  electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder.json  -mw --x64
scripts.package:linux: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder  build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder.json  --linux --x64
scripts.package:mac: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx  electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder.json  --macos --x64
scripts.package:windows: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder.json --win --ia32 --x64
scripts.package:windows:test: npm run build.electron.giddh.test && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder-test.json --win --ia32 --x64 --publish always
scripts.package:mac:test: npm run build.electron.giddh.test && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder-test.json --macos --x64 --publish always
scripts.release:windows:ci: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder-ci.json --win --ia32 --x64 --publish always
scripts.release:mac:ci: npm run build.electron.giddh && cd dist/apps/web-giddh && npx electron-builder build --config ./../../../electron-sign/electron-builder-ci.json --macos --x64 --publish always
